bottomInfo: You will be automatically logged in.
checkboxInfoLabel: What info would you like to receive?
defaultMessage:
Hi,

We're interested in your venue! Please can you share your availability around our ideal date, plus your brochure and/or pricing information?

Thank you!
infoBanner: Please sign up to send your request to the venue and get the information you want.
signUpTitle: We need these details to request a brochure for you
title: Write a message to the venue*
